mapper.select: SELECT MAX(SC_NO)+1 AS SC_NO FROM SOLUTION_CMT
SELECT SC.*, M.USER_ID FROM SOLUTION_CMT SC JOIN MEMBER M ON SC.USER_NO=M.USER_NO WHERE SOLUTION_NO = #{solutionNo} AND SC.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT SC.*, M.USER_ID, CF.SCF_NO, CF.SCF_ORIGINNAME, CF.SCF_SYSNAME FROM SOLUTION_CMT SC JOIN MEMBER M ON SC.USER_NO=M.USER_NO LEFT JOIN SOLUTION_CMT_FILES CF ON SC.SC_NO=CF.SC_NO WHERE SOLUTION_NO = #{solutionNo} AND SC.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT s.*, m.USER_ID FROM SOLUTION_CMT s JOIN MEMBER m ON s.user_no = m.user_no WHERE SC_NO = #{scNo}
